item.title: Sustainable Edge systems and food tech using cloud native technologies, Veeam Kubernetes Korner, Online
item.description: In this show, Sergio and Geoffrey will talk about Sergio’s latest book, “Edge Computing Systems with Kubernetes,” outlining the fundamental components necessary for edge computing and sharing how these systems contribute to environmental sustainability.
